KitKat::

She fell asleep as the medication worked in her system. the nanobots 
took some time, but they finally closed the leak and restarted the 
flow in it proper working order. She still had the fluid in her 
belly. A small arm came up and stuck her belly with a syringe as 
started to drain the fluid from her body.  The nanobots continued to 
repair.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Not knowing what to do, Blackfang simply went the easy way.
> 
> Blackfang: Computer, engage auto-surgery!
> 
> The table sent pain dampeners in Kitkat's system and reduced her 
pain.
> A syringue held by a robotic arm closed in and injected a throng of
> nanobots that went directly at the broken fuild line.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> > KitKat::
> > 
> > She convulsed and contorted in pain. Her stomach was swelling. A 
line 
> > was leaking internally and it had to be repaired. She groaned and 
> > cried in her suffering. She whimpered in a hushed, yet strained 
> > voice. "Somebot...help....me....pain...can't..take...AHHHHH!" She 
> > threw her head back and screamed.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > The Maximal warrior considered his options. He had no time for 
CR.
> > > This bot was critical by now. Operating alone was out of 
question,
> > > since he had no knowledge of such things. He had to wait.
> > > 
> > > He laid Kitkat on the table and went looking for pain-killers, 
> > drugs,
> > > energon catheter, anything that could help her.
> > > 
> > > All the while, he couldn't help thinking she was gorgeous...
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > KitKat::
> > > > 
> > > > She howled out in agony. Her wolf legs kicked out and then 
> > retracted. 
> > > > She arched her back and tossed her head back and 
> > > > forth. "Kill....me..AHHHHHHHHH! 
No...more.....Pain....AHHHHHHH!"
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> 
wrote:
> > > > > Blackfang hurried to get inside the base and went straight 
to 
> > the 
> > > > med bay.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Blackfang: Hang in there, we'll do our best to save you.
> > > > >

<raccoon7679@y...>

> > towards 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > base.  As she went, sh yelled "KENZO! KENZO! KENZO!" 
every 
> > twenty 
> > > > > > feet or so untill she got to the base.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > KitKat::
> > > > > > She groaned as she was picked up. Her body was limp as 
she 
> > had no 
> > > > > > energy left to resist. She opened her optics slightly, 
and 
> > out of 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > corner of her optic, she could see a male bot figure 
picking 
> > her 
> > > > up.  
> > > > > > She couldn't tell who it was. But her wolf nose told her 
that 
> > it 
> > > > was 
> > > > > > another wolf bot. She was about to try to talk when a 
surge 
> > of 
> > > > pain 
> > > > > > ran through her belly. She threw her head back and arched 
her 
> > > > back in 
> > > > > > writhing agony. "AAAHHHHHHHHH!" screaming out in anguish.
> > > > > >

> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> 
> > wrote:

> > frowned 
> > > > but 
> > > > > > made
> > > > > > > no sign of outward defiance.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Blackfang: We will intervene quickly and bring her back 
to 
> > you 
> > > > fully
> > > > > > > functional. In exchange, you must not leave the area or 
> > cause 
> > > > > > trouble.
> > > > > > > You know that an accident happens much too fast in 
> > surgeries...
> > > > > > >

> > being 
> > > > careful
> > > > > > > not to touch her where internal leaks were obvious.
